level.heading: HEARING ON REVOCATION OR SUSPENSION OF REGISTRATION, RECIPROCITY STICKER ORICENSE PURSUANT TO THE CLEAN HANDS ACT (ยง 18-1006)

level.text: Any person whose license, registration, or reciprocity sticker has been ordered revoked or suspended by the Director for knowingly falsifying a certification in violation of the Clean Hand Act (D.C. Code ยง 47-2861 et seq.) may request a hearing.
The request for a hearing shall be made to the Director, in writing, within ten (10) days after the date of the revocation order.
A request for a hearing shall stay the revocation order until the date of the hearing.
If any person fails to appear at a hearing scheduled by the Director, the revocation order shall become effective immediately.
Appeals from any final decision of a Hearing Examiner or Director pursuant to this section shall be taken to the Traffic Adjudication Appeals Board.
